scripts.a11y: yarn dev & wait-on http://localhost:3000; server_pid=$!; yarn run pa11y-ci; test_exit_code=$?; kill "$server_pid"; exit "$test_exit_code";
scripts.test-e2e: yarn mock & wait-on http://localhost:8000; mock_server_pid=$!; NEXT_PUBLIC_DISABLE_AUTH=true yarn dev & wait-on http://localhost:3000; server_pid=$!; yarn run cypress run; test_exit_code=$?; kill "$server_pid"; kill "$mock_server_pid"; exit "$test_exit_code";
scripts.test-e2e-headed: yarn mock & wait-on http://localhost:8000; mock_server_pid=$!; NEXT_PUBLIC_DISABLE_AUTH=true yarn dev & wait-on http://localhost:3000; server_pid=$!; yarn run cypress run --headed; test_exit_code=$?; kill "$server_pid"; kill "$mock_server_pid"; exit "$test_exit_code";
